title: Linux tac Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the tac command in Linux, which reverses the order of lines in a text file. Learn practical examples and how to combine tac with other commands for advanced text processing.

meta.title: Linux tac Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the tac command in Linux, which reverses the order of lines in a text file. Learn practical examples and how to combine tac with other commands for advanced text processing.
meta.keywords: Linux, tac command, text processing, file manipulation, command line, reverse lines, practical examples
